1574350.name: ECHOLOCAUTION ArtWorks
1574350.description:
This DLC is a collection of illustrations & synopsis from ECHOLOCAUTION.

[Contents]

  • This is a collection of setting materials that includes illustrations by designer Fuwa and dot drawings actually used in the main story without exception!
    It also includes numerous rough sketches, unused designs, and rejected materials that can only be seen here.
    Each artwork is accompanied by a comment.
    Moreover, the book contains fascinating stories about the game design by planner Kagehito.
    Please enjoy the world of ECHOLOCAUTION that you can only experience here!
  • Included is a fan kit that includes the title logo and a standing picture of the character!
    Feel free to use them as social networking icons, game distribution materials, etc.

【Post-Purchase Guide】

After purchasing the DLC, a new folder will be installed in the local folder where the ECHOLOCAUTION is located.

  1. Open Steam and select ECHOLOCAUTION from the list of games in the library.
  2. Right-click, open "Properties," open "DLC," and check to see if the installation is complete.
  3. Right-click on the game again, go to "Manage" and click on "Browse Local Files".
  4. In the opened folder, you will find the PDF in the folder "Echolocaution_ArtWorks"!
